name: Taxi Taxi Sim
description:
Hello, Taxi? I urgently need to get to Avenue 14.

Are you familiar with such calls? If not, then come with us to try the coolest game Taxi Taxi Sim. Here we work on the principle that the client is satisfied, regardless of how this is achieved.

If you understand what this game is about, we think you are ready to get behind the wheel of a powerful car to enjoy this taxi driver profession. Sometimes you can close your eyes to some traffic rules, but always remind you that everything must be very safe. Don't forget that you will be the image of the company, so everything must be at the highest level. Please fasten your seat belt and good luck!

Game features :
- Multiple levels
- 3 types of cars (classic, business, sport)
- Different types of clients
